For internal use only
Subject: Acquiring domestic case: information/documents required
Dear ATM team,
The chargeback team is in the process of reviewing the acquiring domestic case containing the following details:
Case ID:
Merchant name (ATM location):
Terminal number:
Card number:
Operation date:
ARN:
Operation amount/currency:
Disputed amount/currency:
RC:
Authorization code:
To make a final decision on the case we kindly request a copy of the ATM transaction record/a copy of the ATM audit tape/an internal transaction log.
Please review the case and reply as soon as possible.
Sincerely yours,
Chargeback team
